name: Green Tea Seed Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Cream
about: What it is:¬†A daily moisturizing cream with Green Tea, Hyaluronic Acid, and squalane to help deeply hydrate and strengthen skin's moisture barrier...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness..Formulation: Lightweight Cream..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Green Tea: rich in amino acids and antioxidants + helps provide moisture to skin.- 5 Types of Hyaluronic Acid: provide deeper, amplified hydration.- Green Tea Barrier Complex: hydrates and helps fortify skin's barrier with Squalane + Ceramide..Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. This product is vegan, gluten free, and cruelty free....What Else You Need to Know:¬† This daily, barrier-boosting moisturizer is powered by our Korean Beauty Green Tea that's designed for skincare, not sipping. We studied over 3,000 varieties to deliver major hydration. Five types of hyaluronic acid + healthy oils like squalane & ceramide help lock in long-lasting moisture...Clinical Results:.After 1 Use:.- 113% strengthened moisture barrier*.- 5X hydration boost**..After 1 Week:.- 100-hour lasting hydration**..*Temporary moisture barrier repair in 30 minutes based on instrumental TEWL and tape stripping test on 31 women ages 20-49..**Based on a 1-week clinical study on 31 women ages 20-49...Dermatologically tested.....CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: -Green Tea: Rich in amino acids and antioxidants and helps provide moisture to skin..- Five Types of Hyaluronic Acid: Provide amplified hydration..- Green Tea Barrier Complex: hydrates and helps fortify skin's barrier with Squalane + Ceramide...Water / Aqua / Eau, Propanediol, Glycerin, Stearyl Dimethicone, Methyl Trimethicone, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Butylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Glyceryl Polymethacrylate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Squalane, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Carbomer, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Cholesterol, Glyceryl Stearate, Tromethamine, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Hyaluronic Acid, Panthenol, Allantoin, Sodium Metaphosphate, Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Xanthan Gum, Glyceryl Caprylate, Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sorbitan Isostearate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Madecassoside, Lactic Acid, Dextrin, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Camellia Sinensis Seed Extract, Ceramide NP, Tocopherol, Phytosphingosine, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- After serum, smooth a dime-sized amount onto face and neck. .- Gently pat for better absorption. .- Use AM & PM. .- Follow with sunscreen in the AM.....Recycling Instructions: .innisfree partners with TerraCycle¬Æ on a no-waste recycling program to give your empties a second life - Join! I recommend all the products in this line if you are like me with sensitive skin and appreciate clean, hydrating yet moisturizing products.  CON: The only product I didn‚Äôt care to repurchase (and I have gone through 2 bottles) is the Vitamin C.  I personally did not see a difference after using for 2 months consistently AM and PM.  Hence the 4/5 star review.  If they improve their Vitamin C potency, definitely a 5/5 line for me.  I hope this review was helpfulü§é

reviews.review_title: Excellent substitute for Drunk Elephant Protini
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry/combination skin (managing to have my driest and oiliest areas be one and the same) and I've been searching for a hydrating, barrier-locking moisturizer for a while. Since I need lots of moisture but also end up very oily in my T-zone, I'm hard to please. This moisturizer is hydrating, absorbs almost instantly, and keeps me feeling moisturized all day without ever feeling greasy. In my opinion, it feels very similar to DE Protini, and improves on several complaints I had with that product. At less than half the price than other options on the market, this moisturizer a holy grail for me.  For years I've used the very light CeraVe daily lotion, they layered a heavier product on top of it (elf Holy Hydration for a while). I wasn't particularly satisfied with my routine and I'm always looking to streamline, so I tried DE Protini after a friend suggested it. I liked how hydrating it felt going on, but it didn't last very long and it felt very silicone-y, almost like a primer. Plus the cost is INSANE.  Since it's so expensive and it wasn't quite what I was looking for, I dug into Sephora reviews to find something else. I settled on this one and I am in love! It has the same luxurious feeling going on as Protini, but it actually feels like it's quenching my skin and it lasts. It smooths the skin without feeling thick and plasticky too, basically solving all my complaints about Protini while still feeling like a very similar product.

I ran out and had no options but to change it temporarily. Once I started using this new moisturizer, MY SKIN STARTED FLAKINGGG (I could've just used too light of a cream for my dry skin which is why I highly recommend this product for ds ppls). I was shocked when my skin was legit SNOWINGG more than the canadian winters outside. When i finally was able to get my hands on this one again a couple days ago, I immediately applied it to the snowflakes on my forehead and waited...now my skin has COMPLETELY STOPPED FLAKING and I can relax over that crisis.
